Uses of Package
adept.utilities

Packages that use adept.utilities
adept.io Provides I/O classes that handle reading/write files in different formats, including LDC Gigaword Corpus, ERE, CoNLL, email and plain text. 
adept.utilities Provides utility classes and functions for creating ADEPT Document objects, for tokenization, regression test, benchmark test, profiler, command-line application and file conversions. 
 

Classes in adept.utilities used by adept.io
PassageAttributes
          The Class PassageAttributes.

          Parse DEFT command-line arguments using args4j.
DocumentMaker
          Implements the white space tokenizer, simple text file parser and provides functionality to create a Document object using the aforementioned utilities.
DocumentSaver
          Implements the white space tokenizer, simple text file parser and provides functionality to create a Document object using the aforementioned utilities.
